WELCOME.INSTRUCTION: Opal is currently available for patients at the Cedars Cancer Centre of the McGill University Health Centre in Montreal.
WELCOME.STAPES: If you are a patient at the Cedars Cancer Centre, please proceed to the Cedars Cancer Foundation kiosk at the S1 level of the Cancer Centre. The staff there will be happy to register you for an Opal account.

SEARCH.TITLE: Confirm Your Identity
SEARCH.INSTRUCTION: To register for Opal, you must have obtained a registration code from a participating hospital. If you have a registration code, please enter it here along with your RAMQ number to confirm your identity.

FIELDERRORMESSAGES.CODEREQUIRED: Please enter a valid registration code.
FIELDERRORMESSAGES.RAMQREQUIRED: Please enter a valid RAMQ number.

SECURE.INSTRUCTION: Please complete the form below to create your Opal account. All fields are required.

PREFERENCE.TITLE: Your Data Access
PREFERENCE.INSTRUCTION: In order to access your medical data using Opal, you must give your consent using the form below.

FIELDNAMES.ACCESSLEVELINSTRUCTION: Please choose the level of access to your personal medical data that you would like to have in Opal. Each access level is explained below:
FIELDNAMES.ALLACCESSLEVEL: I want to receive all of my medical data that are accessible using Opal.
FIELDNAMES.NEEDTOKNOWACCESSLEVEL: I want to receive only my need-to-know medical data using Opal.
FIELDNAMES.ACCESSLECELINCLUDESTITLE: Currently, the following data are available (note: not all hospitals or patients will have all of these)

SUCCESS.TITLE: Registration Successful
SUCCESS.INSTRUCTION: Your Opal account is now ready. You will receive a confirmation email soon.
SUCCESS.THANKYOUMESSAGE: Thank you for registering for Opal!
SUCCESS.DOWNLOADAPP: If you haven’t done so already, please download the Opal app from the iOS App Store or Google Play Store and login to access your medical data.
SUCCESS.PROCESS: If you are on a tablet or smartphone, you may download Opal immediately using the links below. Otherwise, you may click on the links provided in your confirmation email from your mobile device.

TOOLTIP.EMAILINSTRUCTION: Your email address will be used as your username when accessing your Opal account.
TOOLTIP.PASSWORDFORMAT: Your password should be at least 8 characters long and should contain at least one number, one capital letter, one lower-case letter and one special character.
TOOLTIP.REGISTRATIONCODE: Your registration code is a 10-digit code provided by your clinical team at a participating Quebec healthcare institution.
